name: More Smoothies
description:
Blend your very own smoothie on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch! It’s the latest virtual cooking app from Fuller Studios, creators of the very successful “More Tacos! – New”, “More Chocolate!” and more!

More Smoothies gives you all you need to mix, blend, decorate, and drink your smoothie. Use the recipe book to create smoothies such as “Triple Berry Blast” or even “White Gummy Bear.” If you’re feeling creative, just open up the fridge and choose from tons of fruits, ice creams, and other ingredients to make your very own smoothie creation.

After that, add your food to the blender and get ready to blend! When your smoothie is blended, you’ll have a chance to add as many decorations as you want, from wacky straws to gummy worms and whip cream!

Finally drink your smoothie and find out how many calories it has. Don’t forget to save your special creation or share it through email or facebook!

More Smoothies features:
-Beautiful Hi-Res retina graphics
-Thousands of different possible combinations
-6 special recipes to get you started
-Fridge full of fruit and ice cream to make your own custom smoothies
-Blender that blends the food and turns it into a smoothie!
-Over 30 decorations

Post reviews with requests for future updates, because we listen and provide many free updates!
